titleStmt.title: Exchange ware at the second hand viz. Band, Ruffe, and Cuffe, lately out, and now newly dearned vp. Or a dialogue, acted in a shew in the famous Vniuersitie of Cambridge.
Merrie dialogue, betweene Band, Cuffe, and Ruffe.
Exchange ware at the second hand viz. Band, Ruffe, and Cuffe, lately out, and now newly dearned vp. Or a dialogue, acted in a shew in the famous Vniuersitie of Cambridge.
Merrie dialogue, betweene Band, Cuffe, and Ruffe.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Stansby for Myles Partrich, and are to be sold at his shop neere Saint Dunstones Church-yard in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Originally published earlier the same year as: A merrie dialogue, betweene Band, Cuffe, and Ruffe.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
